description.narrative: Ghana - Transportation Project - National Highway Activity: the Upgrades to Sections of N1 Highway ("N1 Activity") will fund rehabilitation to, and upgrades of, specific sections of the N1 Highway in an effort to improve the efficiency of the greater road network in and around Accra, including access to the key sea and air export facilities. MCC Funding will support the following: (i) Improvement and upgrade to the 14 km of N1 Highway between Tetteh Quarshie and Mallam Junctions as a three lane dual carriageway (without service roads) and provision of grade separation interchanges at the Dimples-Achimota and Mallam Junctions. (ii) Feasibility and design studies and implementation of the environmental and social mitigation measures.
Greater Accra Region

condition.narrative: Prior to any MCC Disbursement for the N1 Activity: MiDA has selected and engaged an Implementing Entity under an Implementing Entity Agreement, and the agreement remains in full force and effect

Prior to any MCC Disbursement with respect to any construction under the N1 Activity: MiDA has selected and engaged one or more firms to supervise the construction activities under the N1 Activity, approved by MCC, or in the event that such position is vacated, MiDA is actively recruiting for such position.

Prior to any MCC Disbursement with respect to any construction under the N1 Activity: MiDA has submitted evidence demonstrating that the construction activities for improvements to the N1 Highway or along the right of way between Tetteh Quarshie and Mallam Junctions, funded by sources other than MCC Funding, did not commence without prior MCC approval.

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Ghana - Transportation Project - National Highway Activity: the Upgrades to Sections of N1 Highway ("N1 Activity") will fund rehabilitation to, and upgrades of, specific sections of the N1 Highway in an effort to improve the efficiency of the greater road network in and around Accra, including access to the key sea and air export facilities. MCC Funding will support the following: (i) Improvement and upgrade to the 14 km of N1 Highway between Tetteh Quarshie and Mallam Junctions as a three lane dual carriageway (without service roads) and provision of grade separation interchanges at the Dimples-Achimota and Mallam Junctions. (ii) Feasibility and design studies and implementation of the environmental and social mitigation measures.
